entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:35 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nelson 8:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
